name: Escape ! (DCGame)
description: Are you scared of ghost ? don't worry about that ! this is not a jumpscare game it's funny and little horror. If There was a Bug you can Contact me on youtube or comment. You play as a boy named John Lemon. John Lemon is being challenged by his friend to go to the haunted house. John Lemon is to scared so he want to back but there is a REAL ghost in the haunted house. You have to help John Lemon to escape from the haunted house !
